Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Leclaire
ShortDescription: WB 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee and into Jefferson Park: due to, street blockage near Foster/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee and into Jefferson Park: due to, street blockage near Foster/Leclaire.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #X9 Ashland Express and #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/42nd
ShortDescription: X9 Ashland Exp & 9 Ashland buses are rerouted in both directions via Ashland, Pershing, Halsted, 47th and Ashland due to police activity near Ashland/42nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my route?

#X9 Ashland Express and #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, Pershing, Halsted, 47th, then resume their normal route on Ashland due to police activity near Ashland/42nd.   

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Central Park
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Central Park due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Central Park due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Cicero.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop and Central Park at this time.

  • Shuttle buses are available between 54th/Cermak and Central Park to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

  • #21 Cermak buses to provide connecting service Eastbound and Westbound, and
  • #54 Cicero buses to provide connecting service Northbound and Southbound.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 16th, Cermak, then resume their normal route on Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/Cermak.
